page.title: 08Recreation,Abermorddu&Area
page.content:
{Popular Children's games. {Tip:}Three or more players are needed. One player is picked to be'on' and counts to ten whilst the other players get as far away as possible.Once the count is completed the person who is 'on' tries to 'tip'(touch) one of the other players.The first person 'tipped' then becomes the next person 'on' and the game begins again.
{Donkey:}In this game four or more players stand apart and throw a ball to each other.A player who drops the ball becomes a 'D' and is given each of the letters of the word Donkey each time the ball is dropped.Once a player has spelt 'donkey', he/she is out of the game which continues until only one player is left.
